## FormatText.invert() method

Returns an operation that negates the effect of the current operation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
/** @override */
invert(state: FlowContent): FormatText;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  state | [FlowContent](./scribing.flowcontent.md) | The state, before the current operation is applied, that shall be used to compute an inverse. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[FormatText](./scribing.formattext.md)

An inverse of the current operation, or `null` when the current operation cannot be inverted with respect to the supplied state.
